paper_abstract: It is proved in this paper that an RGD(3, g; v) can be embedded in an RGD(3, g; u) if and only if u - g = v - g = 0 (mod 2), u = v = 0 (mod 3), u = v = 0 (mod g), v >= 3g, u >= 3v, and (g, v) not equal (2, 6), (2, 12), (6, 18).
paper_title: Embeddings of resolvable group divisible designs with block size 3
